content.raw: Ah, fantastic, good catch. Yes, that's definitely it - BLACS is supposed to be able to run from any directory, and at one point we converted all paths in it to absolute paths to allow this. But we missed that one. Will use the python `tempfile` module to use the proper temporary directory on the system to store the file in.
content.html: Ah, fantastic, good catch. Yes, that's definitely it - BLACS is supposed to be able to run from any directory, and at one point we converted all paths in it to absolute paths to allow this. But we missed that one. Will use the python tempfile module to use the proper temporary directory on the system to store the file in.
